description:
Finds and replaces a value in specified columns of a datatable.
The pattern can be a test or a regular expression.
If pattern is a text, only the first occurrence will be replaced.

input.name: pattern
input.description:
A text or a regular expression to be replaced.
Regular expressions must be wrapped with `/` character (e.g. `/.*/`).

input.name: ignore case
input.description:
Whether lowercase and uppercase letters should be treated as equivalent.
Defaults to `True`.

input.name: replacement
input.description:
A text that replaces the substring matched by the specified `pattern`.
 If unspecified, matches will be replaced with a blank text (i.e. `""`).

input.name: columns
input.description:
A list of columns in `data` to be searched.
If unspecified, it defaults to all columns in `data`.

output.name: data
output.description: A new datatable with target column added.
